TEXT.English: [BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Giant Trees[COLOR_REVERT] grow exclusively in [LINK=FEATURE_JUNGLE]Jungles[\LINK].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Valuable Wood is very hard, which combined with its very high density (it is one of the woods that sink in water), fine texture, and ability to polish very smoothly, has made it very valuable as an ornamental wood. The species is still fairly widespread and frequent in the wild, though threatened by over-harvesting for its valuable wood; it is also extensively planted within its native range for wood production.
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'acajou est un nom vernaculaire ambigu qui désigne un ensemble d'arbres tropicaux de la famille des Méliacées, dont la caractéristique principale est d'avoir un bois de couleur rose pâle ou rouge. Les fruits de l'acajou sont des akènes. Il y a deux variétés principales d'acajou : l'acajou d'Afrique (le genre Khaya) et l'acajou d'Amérique (le genre Swietenia).
TEXT.German: [BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Urwaldriesen[COLOR_REVERT] wachsen nur im [LINK=FEATURE_JUNGLE]Dschungel[\LINK].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Edelholz ist sehr hart, hat eine hohe dichte, feine Texturen und kann sehr glatt geschliffen werden. Dadurch ist es sehr begehrt um Verzierungen oder hochwertige Holzprodukte, wie zum Beispiel Möbel herzustellen.

TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]RED PEPPER[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] can be cultivated on hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] terrain. To make a colonist produce Red Pepper, assign him to the [LINK=PROFESSION_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Red Pepper Planter[\LINK] profession.[NEWLINE]Red Pepper production is highest on plots bearing the [LINK=BONUS_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper Plants[\LINK] Bonus, and can further be increased by building [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_COLLECTORS_POST]Collector's Posts[\LINK] on Red Pepper-producing plots and employing [LINK=UNIT_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Expert Red Pepper Planters[\LINK]. These experts can be trained in native villages.[PARAGRAPH:1]Red Pepper is the raw material that is required for the production of [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]The cayenne pepper, also known as the Guinea spice, Cow Horn Pepper, aleva or bird pepper or, especially in its powdered form, red pepper, is a hot, red chili pepper used to flavor dishes and for medicinal purposes. Named for the city of Cayenne in French Guiana, it is a cultivar of Capsicum annuum related to bell peppers, jalapenos, and others. The Capsicum genus is in the nightshade family.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Capsicum frutescens est un « piment de Cayenne ». Il appartient à la famille des Solanaceae et est cultivé pour ses fruits à la saveur particulièrement piquante. Sur l'échelle de Scoville, il est noté de 30 000 jusqu'à 50 000. Il en existe plusieurs variétés, dont Capsicum frutescens tabasco qui entre dans la composition de la sauce du même nom.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Roter Pfeffer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roter Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] kann auf Hügeln der [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] angebaut werden. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Pfefferpflanzer[\LINK] zugewiesen werden. Der Spezialist hierfür ist der [LINK=UNIT_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Erfahrene Pfefferpflanzer[\LINK], welcher bei Ureinwohner ausgebildet werden kann.[NEWLINE]Die höchsten Erträge für Roten Pfeffer lassen sich auf Feldern erwirtschaften, die die Bonus Ressource [LINK=BONUS_RED_PEPPER]Roter Pfeffer[\LINK] vorweisen. Duch den Bau von [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_COLLECTORS_POST]Sammelstellen[\LINK] lassen sich die Erträge noch weiter erhöhen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Roter Pfeffer ist der Rohstoff für die Herstellung von [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Gewürzen[\LINK][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Der Cayenne-Pfeffer, auch bekannt als Guinea-Gewürze oder auch Roter Pfeffer, ist ein scharfer roter Chili Pfeffer, der genutzt wird um Gerichte zu verfeinern oder auch als Medizin Anwendung findet. Er zählt zu den Nachtschattengewächsen.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The cayenne pepper, also known as the Guinea spice, Cow Horn Pepper, aleva or bird pepper or, especially in its powdered form, red pepper, is a hot, red chili pepper used to flavor dishes and for medicinal purposes. Named for the city of Cayenne in French Guiana, it is a cultivar of Capsicum annuum related to bell peppers, jalapenos, and others. The Capsicum genus is in the nightshade family.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper Plants[COLOR_REVERT] grow on hilly [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] Terrain that is either open or overgrown by [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST]Forest[\LINK] or [LINK=FEATURE_LIGHT_FOREST]Light Forest[\LINK].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]The cayenne pepper, also known as the Guinea spice, Cow Horn Pepper, aleva or bird pepper or, especially in its powdered form, red pepper, is a hot, red chili pepper used to flavor dishes and for medicinal purposes. Gelegentlich können besonders gute Anbaugebiete für Roten Pfeffer auch von [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST]Wald[\LINK] oder [LINK=FEATURE_LIGHT_FOREST]Buschland[\LINK] überwachsen sein.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Der Cayenne-Pfeffer, auch bekannt als Guinea-Gewürze oder auch Roter Pfeffer, ist ein scharfer roter Chili Pfeffer, der genutzt wird um Gerichte zu verfeinern oder auch als Medizin Anwendung findet. TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]BARLEY[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT] can be grown on flatlands on [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grass[\LINK] or [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] terrain. To make a colonist produce Barley, assign him to the [LINK=PROFESSION_BARLEY_FARMER]Barley Planter[\LINK] profession.[NEWLINE]Barley production is highest on plots bearing the [LINK=BONUS_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK] Bonus, and can further be increased by building [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]Farms[\LINK] on Barley-producing plots and employing [LINK=UNIT_FARMER]Expert Farmers[\LINK]. These experts can both be trained in native villages and be recruited in Europe.[PARAGRAPH:1]Barley is the raw material that is required for the production of [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT] is one of the oldest types of corn humanity knows. It is not as good for production of flour as for example wheat but very well suited for making [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'orge commune (Hordeum vulgare) est une céréale à paille, plante herbacée annuelle de la famille des poacées. Elle est la plus ancienne céréale cultivée.[réf. nécessaire] Bien adaptée au climat méditerranéen du fait de sa rusticité, elle constituait ainsi la principale céréale cultivée dans l'Antiquité grecque et était consommée sous forme de galette ou de bouillie (maza). L'orge pousse aussi bien sous les tropiques qu'à 4 500 m d'altitude au Tibet.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Gerste[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] can im Flachland des [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Graslandes[\LINK] oder der [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] angebaut werden. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_BARLEY_FARMER]Gerstebauer[\LINK] zugewiesen werden. [LINK=UNIT_FARMER]Expert Farmers[\LINK] sind hierfür die Spezialisten. Diese können sowohl in Europa rekrutiert werden, wie auch von Ureinwohnern ausgebildet werden.[NEWLINE]Felder mit der Bonus Ressource [LINK=BONUS_BARLEY]Gerste[\LINK] repräsentieren die besten Anbauflächen. Durch den Bau einer [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]Farm[\LINK] kann der Ertrag weiter gesteigert werden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Gerste wird benötig um [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Bier[\LINK] zu brauen.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] ist eine der ältesten Getreidesorten, die die Menschheit kennt. Bezüglich des Stärkegehalts und der Mehlerzeugung ist es nicht so ergiebig, wie andere Getreidesorten, so zum Beispiel Weizen, aber es eignet sich hervorragend zur Herstellung von Bier.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT] is one of the oldest types of corn humanity knows. It is not as good for production of flour as for example wheat but very well suited for making [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT] is one of the oldest types of corn humanity knows. It is not as good for production of flour as for example wheat but very well suited for making [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]GRAPES[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grapes[COLOR_REVERT] can be cultivated on hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grass[\LINK] terrain. To make a colonist produce Grapes, assign him to the [LINK=PROFESSION_GRAPES_PICKER]Grape Picker[\LINK] profession.[NEWLINE]Grapes production is highest on plots bearing the [LINK=BONUS_GRAPES]Grapevines[\LINK] Bonus, and can further be increased by building [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_VINEYARD]Vineyards[\LINK] on Grapes-producing plots and employing [LINK=UNIT_GRAPES_PICKER]Expert Grape Pickers[\LINK]. These experts can be recruited in Europe.[PARAGRAPH:1]Grapes are the raw materials that are required for the production of [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Wine, a beverage made from fermented grapes, was first produced as early as 6000 BC. Its use spread throughout the Middle East and Egypt, and it quickly became a popular beverage of the ancient world. The grapes used for the making of wine are grown in many different regions of the world. Most vineyards are located in hills and valleys of temperate regions. Wine making as an industry has been perfected over several centuries. Many regions such as the Rhine and Loire valleys of Europe are well known for their fine wines, and derive a significant portion of their economy from wine making.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le vin est une boisson obtenue par la fermentation du raisin. Sa production débute dès 6 000 ans av. J.-C. Sa consommation se répand à travers tout le Moyen-Orient et l'Egypte, et il devient rapidement une boisson très populaire dans le monde antique. Le raisin utilisé dans la fabrication du vin est cultivé dans de nombreuses régions du monde. Les vignes sont généralement situées sur les coteaux et dans les vallées des régions tempérées. Les procédés de fabrication du vin ont été perfectionnés au cours des siècles. De nombreuses régions, comme les vallées du Rhin et de la Loire, sont réputées pour leurs bons vins, et une grande partie de leur économie est liée à la fabrication du vin.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Weintrauben[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] wachsen in hügeligem [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grasland[\LINK]. Um Weintrauben zu produzieren, muss man einem Kolonisten den Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_GRAPES_PICKER]Weintraubensammler[\LINK] zuweisen. [LINK=UNIT_GRAPES_PICKER]Erfahrene Weintraubensammler[\LINK] sind hierfür besonder geeignet.[NEWLINE]Die höchsten Erträge an Weintrauben, lassen sich auf Geländefeldern mit der Bonus Ressource [LINK=BONUS_GRAPES]Weintrauben[\LINK] erzielen. Durch das Anlegen von [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_VINEYARD]Weingärten[\LINK] kann der Ertrag weite gesteigert werden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Weintrauben sind der Rohstoff zur Herstellung von [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wein[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Der aus fermentierten Trauben hergestellte Wein wurde erstmals um 6000 vor Christus produziert und war im Nahen Osten und in Ägypten weit verbreitet. Das Getränk entwickelte sich schnell zu einem der beliebtesten kulinarischen Genüsse der Antike. Die für die Weinherstellung benötigten Trauben werden in vielen verschiedenen Gebieten der Welt angebaut, die meisten Weinhänge befinden sich jedoch in den Hügeln und Tälern von Regionen mit gemäßigtem Klima. Im Laufe mehrerer Jahrhunderte wurde die industrielle Weinherstellung immer weiter perfektioniert. Viele Anbaugebiete wie die Rhein- und Loiretäler in Europa sind für ihre feinen Weine bekannt und beziehen einen Großteil ihrer wirtschaftlichen Erträge aus der Weinproduktion.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Realizzato dalla fermentazione dell'uva, il primo vino risale circa al 6000 a. C. e si diffuse rapirdamente attraverso il Medio Oriente e l'Egitto, diventando una delle bevande più popolari del mondo antico. Le qualità d'uva usate per la realizzazione del vino crescono in differenti zone del mondo; la maggior parte delle vigne si possono trovare sulle colline e nelle vallate di regioni dal clima temperato. L'industria del vino è andata perfezionandosi nel corso dei secoli: molte regioni europee, come le vallate del Reno e della Loira, sono rinomate per la produzione di ottimi vini, principale forma di economia della zona.

Las uvas empleadas en la fabricación del vino crecen en muchas y muy distintas partes del mundo. La mayoría de las viñas están en colinas y valles de regiones templadas. La vinicultura se ha perfeccionado como industria a lo largo de varios siglos. Muchas regiones, como los valles del Rin y del Loira en Europa, son conocidas por sus grandes vinos y obtienen una parte significativa de sus ingresos de la vinicultura.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Wine, a beverage made from fermented grapes, was first produced as early as 6000 BC. Its use spread throughout the Middle East and Egypt, and it quickly became a popular beverage of the ancient world. The grapes used for the making of wine are grown in many different regions of the world. Most vineyards are located in hills and valleys of temperate regions. Wine making as an industry has been perfected over several centuries. Many regions such as the Rhine and Loire valleys of Europe are well known for their fine wines, and derive a significant portion of their economy from wine making.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le vin est une boisson obtenue par la fermentation du raisin. Sa production débute dès 6 000 ans av. J.-C. Sa consommation se répand à travers tout le Moyen-Orient et l'Egypte, et il devient rapidement une boisson très populaire dans le monde antique. Le raisin utilisé dans la fabrication du vin est cultivé dans de nombreuses régions du monde. Les vignes sont généralement situées sur les coteaux et dans les vallées des régions tempérées. Les procédés de fabrication du vin ont été perfectionnés au cours des siècles. De nombreuses régions, comme les vallées du Rhin et de la Loire, sont réputées pour leurs bons vins, et une grande partie de leur économie est liée à la fabrication du vin.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Grapes in North America were a part of many Native American Indian diets, but were considered by most Europeans as unsuitable for wine. Europeans repeatedly tried to transplant more familiar varieties of grape to the new world. Early in the 17th century, French vine growers were brought to the New World to teach colonists cultivate grapes.

TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]FURNITURE[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT] is a manufactured good that can be made from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK]. To do this, a colonist needs to be given the [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] profession in the [LINK=FURNITURE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Cabinetmaker's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The output of Furniture can be doubled by employing [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK], who can be recruited in Europe.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Valuable Wood is very hard, which combined with its very high density (it is one of the woods that sink in water), fine texture, and ability to polish very smoothly, has made it very valuable as an ornamental wood. The species is still fairly widespread and frequent in the wild, though threatened by over-harvesting for its valuable wood; it is also extensively planted within its native range for wood production.
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'ébéniste fabrique des meubles et panneaux en bois, composés d'un bâti en menuiserie sur lequel sont appliquées des feuilles de bois précieux appelées placages ou de toute autre matière qui dissimulent entièrement ou partiellement le bâti.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Möbel[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbel[COLOR_REVERT] sind die Fertigware, die aus [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Edelholz[\LINK] hergestellt wird. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Möbelmacher[\LINK] im [LINK=FURNITURE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Möbelmacherhaus[\LINK] oder einer dessen Ausbaustufen zugewiesen werden. [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Meister Möbelmacher[\LINK] sind darin besonders geschickt. Diese können in Europa rekrutiert werden.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Edelholz ist sehr hart, hat eine hohe dichte, feine Texturen und kann sehr glatt geschliffen werden. Dadurch ist es sehr begehrt um Verzierungen oder hochwertige Holzprodukte, wie zum Beispiel Möbel herzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Valuable Wood is very hard, which combined with its very high density (it is one of the woods that sink in water), fine texture, and ability to polish very smoothly, has made it very valuable as an ornamental wood. The species is still fairly widespread and frequent in the wild, though threatened by over-harvesting for its valuable wood; it is also extensively planted within its native range for wood production.

The species is still fairly widespread and frequent in the wild, though threatened by over-harvesting for its valuable wood; it is also extensively planted within its native range for wood production.

The species is still fairly widespread and frequent in the wild, though threatened by over-harvesting for its valuable wood; it is also extensively planted within its native range for wood production.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Furniture makers during the colonial period were often little more than skilled carpenters with shops set up in rural villages. There they built and repaired goods needed primarily by farm families. Colonists who had money tended to import the majority of their furniture directly from Europe, as it was typically better made and was in vogue with the latest European styles. However, some colonial furniture makers did try to replicate such European styles.
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'ébéniste fabrique des meubles et panneaux en bois, composés d'un bâti en menuiserie sur lequel sont appliquées des feuilles de bois précieux appelées placages ou de toute autre matière qui dissimulent entièrement ou partiellement le bâti.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Edelholz ist sehr hart, hat eine hohe dichte, feine Texturen und kann sehr glatt geschliffen werden. Dadurch ist es sehr begehrt um Verzierungen oder hochwertige Holzprodukte, wie zum Beispiel Möbel herzustellen.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Valuable Wood is very hard, which combined with its very high density (it is one of the woods that sink in water), fine texture, and ability to polish very smoothly, has made it very valuable as an ornamental wood. The species is still fairly widespread and frequent in the wild, though threatened by over-harvesting for its valuable wood; it is also extensively planted within its native range for wood production.

TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]SPICES[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] are manufactured goods that can be made from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Peppers[\LINK]. To do this, a colonist needs to be given the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] profession in the [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The output of Spices can be doubled by employing [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK], who can be recruited in Europe.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]The cayenne pepper, also known as the Guinea spice, Cow Horn Pepper, aleva or bird pepper or, especially in its powdered form, red pepper, is a hot, red chili pepper used to flavor dishes and for medicinal purposes. Named for the city of Cayenne in French Guiana, it is a cultivar of Capsicum annuum related to bell peppers, jalapenos, and others. The Capsicum genus is in the nightshade family.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Capsicum frutescens est un « piment de Cayenne ». Il appartient à la famille des Solanaceae et est cultivé pour ses fruits à la saveur particulièrement piquante. Sur l'échelle de Scoville, il est noté de 30 000 jusqu'à 50 000. Il en existe plusieurs variétés, dont Capsicum frutescens tabasco qui entre dans la composition de la sauce du même nom.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Gewürze[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] sind die Fertigware, die aus [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Rotem Pfeffer[\LINK] hergestellt wird. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Gewürzhändler[\LINK] im [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HOUSE]Gewürzhändlerhaus[\LINK] oder dessen Ausbaustufen zugewiesen werden. Die Spezialisten hierfür sind [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Meister Gewürzhändler[\LINK]. Diese können in Europa rekrutiert werden.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]SDer Cayenne-Pfeffer, auch bekannt als Guinea-Gewürze oder auch Roter Pfeffer, ist ein scharfer roter Chili Pfeffer, der genutzt wird um Gerichte zu verfeinern oder auch als Medizin Anwendung findet. Er zählt zu den Nachtschattengewächsen.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The cayenne pepper, also known as the Guinea spice, Cow Horn Pepper, aleva or bird pepper or, especially in its powdered form, red pepper, is a hot, red chili pepper used to flavor dishes and for medicinal purposes. Named for the city of Cayenne in French Guiana, it is a cultivar of Capsicum annuum related to bell peppers, jalapenos, and others. The Capsicum genus is in the nightshade family.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The European exploration of the New World brought about the discovery of several new spices, such as allspice, bell and chili peppers, vanilla and chocolate. European markets soon developed for these new spices with spice traders eagerly capitalizing on the demand.

TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]BEER[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] is a manufactured good that can be brewed from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK]. To do this, a colonist needs to be given the [LINK=PROFESSION_BREWER]Brewer[\LINK] profession in the [LINK=BUILDING_BREWERS_HOUSE]Brewer's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The output of Beer can be doubled by employing [LINK=UNIT_BREWER]Master Brewers[\LINK], who can be recruited in Europe.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Beer is an alcoholic beverage produced by the saccharification of starch and fermentation of the resulting sugar. The starch and saccharification enzymes are often derived from malted cereal grains, most commonly malted barley and malted wheat. Most beer is also flavoured with hops, which add bitterness and act as a natural preservative, though other flavourings such as herbs or fruit may occasionally be included. The preparation of beer is called brewing. Beer is the world's most widely consumed alcoholic beverage. It is the third-most popular drink overall, after water and tea.
TEXT.French: [TAB]La bière est une boisson alcoolisée obtenue par fermentation de matières glucidiques végétales et d'eau. C'est une boisson alcoolisée obtenue par transformation de matières amylacées par voies enzymatiques et microbiologiques. Plus spécifiquement de nos jours, elles est généralement fabriquée à partir d'eau, de malt (céréale germée, principalement de l'orge, parfois additionné d'autres céréales) et depuis le Moyen âge, de houblon. C'est l'une des boissons les plus populaires et consommées au monde.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Bier[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bier[COLOR_REVERT] wird aus [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Gerste[\LINK] gebraut. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_BREWER]Bierbrauer[\LINK] im [LINK=BUILDING_BREWERS_HOUSE]Brauhaus[\LINK] oder einer dessen Ausbaustufen zugewiesen werden. [LINK=UNIT_BREWER]Meister Bierbrauer[\LINK] sind hierfür besonders gut geeignet und können in Europa rekrutiert werden.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Bier ist ein alkohol- und kohlensäurehaltiges Getränk, das durch Gärung meist aus den Grundzutaten Wasser, Malz und Hopfen gewonnen wird. Malz wiederum ist getrocknetes und gekeimtes Getreide, meist Gerste. Bier ist schon seit tausenden Jahren bekannt.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Beer is an alcoholic beverage produced by the saccharification of starch and fermentation of the resulting sugar. The starch and saccharification enzymes are often derived from malted cereal grains, most commonly malted barley and malted wheat. Most beer is also flavoured with hops, which add bitterness and act as a natural preservative, though other flavourings such as herbs or fruit may occasionally be included. The preparation of beer is called brewing. Beer is the world's most widely consumed alcoholic beverage. It is the third-most popular drink overall, after water and tea..

Most beer is also flavoured with hops, which add bitterness and act as a natural preservative, though other flavourings such as herbs or fruit may occasionally be included. TEXT.English: [TAB]Brewers typically produced beer for colonists. The Puritans on the Mayflower brought over with them more beer than water. Experience in Europe had taught them that drinking beer was safer than drinking water which could often be polluted with sewage or garbage. Alcohol was also an found to be an effective analgesic, which helped to not only provide the energy necessary for hard work, but also generally enhanced the quality of life.

C'est une boisson alcoolisée obtenue par transformation de matières amylacées par voies enzymatiques et microbiologiques. Plus spécifiquement de nos jours, elles est généralement fabriquée à partir d'eau, de malt (céréale germée, principalement de l'orge, parfois additionné d'autres céréales) et depuis le Moyen âge, de houblon. C'est l'une des boissons les plus populaires et consommées au monde.

TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Beer is an alcoholic drink. Mostly made from barley.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]Beer is an alcoholic drink. Mostly made from barley.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Brewing is the production of beer through steeping a starch source (commonly cereal grains) in water and then fermenting with yeast. Brewing has taken place since around the 6th millennium BC, and archaeological evidence suggests that this technique was used in ancient Egypt. Brewers typically produced beer for colonists. The Puritans on the Mayflower brought over with them more beer than water. Experience in Europe had taught them that drinking beer was safer than drinking water which could often be polluted with sewage or garbage. Alcohol was also an found to be an effective analgesic, which helped to not only provide the energy necessary for hard work, but also generally enhanced the quality of life.

Plus spécifiquement de nos jours, elles est généralement fabriquée à partir d'eau, de malt (céréale germée, principalement de l'orge, parfois additionné d'autres céréales) et depuis le Moyen âge, de houblon. C'est l'une des boissons les plus populaires et consommées au monde.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Beer is an alcoholic beverage produced by the saccharification of starch and fermentation of the resulting sugar. The starch and saccharification enzymes are often derived from malted cereal grains, most commonly malted barley and malted wheat. Most beer is also flavoured with hops, which add bitterness and act as a natural preservative, though other flavourings such as herbs or fruit may occasionally be included. The preparation of beer is called brewing. Beer is the world's most widely consumed alcoholic beverage. It is the third-most popular drink overall, after water and tea.
TEXT.French: [TAB]La bière est une boisson alcoolisée obtenue par fermentation de matières glucidiques végétales et d'eau. C'est une boisson alcoolisée obtenue par transformation de matières amylacées par voies enzymatiques et microbiologiques. Plus spécifiquement de nos jours, elles est généralement fabriquée à partir d'eau, de malt (céréale germée, principalement de l'orge, parfois additionné d'autres céréales) et depuis le Moyen âge, de houblon. C'est l'une des boissons les plus populaires et consommées au monde.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Bier ist ein alkohol- und kohlensäurehaltiges Getränk, das durch Gärung meist aus den Grundzutaten Wasser, Malz und Hopfen gewonnen wird. Malz wiederum ist getrocknetes und gekeimtes Getreide, meist Gerste. Bier ist schon seit tausenden Jahren bekannt.

The starch and saccharification enzymes are often derived from malted cereal grains, most commonly malted barley and malted wheat. Most beer is also flavoured with hops, which add bitterness and act as a natural preservative, though other flavourings such as herbs or fruit may occasionally be included. The preparation of beer is called brewing. Beer is the world's most widely consumed alcoholic beverage. It is the third-most popular drink overall, after water and tea.

TEXT.English: [TAB][H1]WINE[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] is a manufactured good that can be concocted from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK]. To do this, a colonist needs to be given the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession in the [LINK=BUILDING_VINTAGERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The output of Wine can be doubled by employing [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK], who can be recruited in Europe.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Wine, a beverage made from fermented grapes, was first produced as early as 6000 BC. Its use spread throughout the Middle East and Egypt, and it quickly became a popular beverage of the ancient world. The grapes used for the making of wine are grown in many different regions of the world. Most vineyards are located in hills and valleys of temperate regions. Wine making as an industry has been perfected over several centuries. Many regions such as the Rhine and Loire valleys of Europe are well known for their fine wines, and derive a significant portion of their economy from wine making.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le vin est une boisson obtenue par la fermentation du raisin. Sa production débute dès 6 000 ans av. J.-C. Sa consommation se répand à travers tout le Moyen-Orient et l'Egypte, et il devient rapidement une boisson très populaire dans le monde antique. Le raisin utilisé dans la fabrication du vin est cultivé dans de nombreuses régions du monde. Les vignes sont généralement situées sur les coteaux et dans les vallées des régions tempérées. Les procédés de fabrication du vin ont été perfectionnés au cours des siècles. De nombreuses régions, comme les vallées du Rhin et de la Loire, sont réputées pour leurs bons vins, et une grande partie de leur économie est liée à la fabrication du vin.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Wein[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT] wird aus [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Weintrauben[\LINK] hergestellt. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Winzer[\LINK] im [LINK=BUILDING_VINTAGERS_HOUSE]Winzerhaus[\LINK] oder einer dessen Ausbaustufen zugewiesen werden. [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Meister Winzer[\LINK] sind hierfür besonders gut geeignet und können in Europa rekrutiert werden.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Der aus fermentierten Trauben hergestellte Wein wurde erstmals um 6000 vor Christus produziert und war im Nahen Osten und in Ägypten weit verbreitet. Das Getränk entwickelte sich schnell zu einem der beliebtesten kulinarischen Genüsse der Antike. Die für die Weinherstellung benötigten Trauben werden in vielen verschiedenen Gebieten der Welt angebaut, die meisten Weinhänge befinden sich jedoch in den Hügeln und Tälern von Regionen mit gemäßigtem Klima. Im Laufe mehrerer Jahrhunderte wurde die industrielle Weinherstellung immer weiter perfektioniert. Viele Anbaugebiete wie die Rhein- und Loiretäler in Europa sind für ihre feinen Weine bekannt und beziehen einen Großteil ihrer wirtschaftlichen Erträge aus der Weinproduktion.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Realizzato dalla fermentazione dell'uva, il primo vino risale circa al 6000 a. C. e si diffuse rapirdamente attraverso il Medio Oriente e l'Egitto, diventando una delle bevande più popolari del mondo antico. Le qualità d'uva usate per la realizzazione del vino crescono in differenti zone del mondo; la maggior parte delle vigne si possono trovare sulle colline e nelle vallate di regioni dal clima temperato. L'industria del vino è andata perfezionandosi nel corso dei secoli: molte regioni europee, come le vallate del Reno e della Loira, sono rinomate per la produzione di ottimi vini, principale forma di economia della zona.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]El vino, una bebida preparada a partir de uvas fermentadas, se elaboró por vez primera ya en el 6000 a. C. Su consumo se extendió rápidamente por Oriente Medio y Egipto, y pronto se convirtió en una popular bebida en el mundo antiguo. Las uvas empleadas en la fabricación del vino crecen en muchas y muy distintas partes del mundo. La mayoría de las viñas están en colinas y valles de regiones templadas. La vinicultura se ha perfeccionado como industria a lo largo de varios siglos. Muchas regiones, como los valles del Rin y del Loira en Europa, son conocidas por sus grandes vinos y obtienen una parte significativa de sus ingresos de la vinicultura.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Winemakers in the colonies, learned to make a wide variety of differing wines from fruits due to the native varieties being unsuitable to European tastes. They additionally made wine from such products as flowers, herbs, and oak leaves.

TEXT.English: [TAB]A winery is a building or property that produces wine, or a business involved in the production of wine, such as a wine company. Some wine companies own many wineries. Besides wine making equipment, larger wineries may also feature warehouses, bottling lines, laboratories, and large expanses of tanks known as tank farms. The oldest winery in the world found to date is a 6,000 year old winery in the Areni region of Armenia, which is still a wine making region today.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le vin est une boisson obtenue par la fermentation du raisin. Sa production débute dès 6 000 ans av. J.-C. The oldest winery in the world found to date is a 6,000 year old winery in the Areni region of Armenia, which is still a wine making region today.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le vin est une boisson obtenue par la fermentation du raisin. Sa production débute dès 6 000 ans av. J.-C. Sa consommation se répand à travers tout le Moyen-Orient et l'Egypte, et il devient rapidement une boisson très populaire dans le monde antique. Le raisin utilisé dans la fabrication du vin est cultivé dans de nombreuses régions du monde. Les vignes sont généralement situées sur les coteaux et dans les vallées des régions tempérées. Les procédés de fabrication du vin ont été perfectionnés au cours des siècles. De nombreuses régions, comme les vallées du Rhin et de la Loire, sont réputées pour leurs bons vins, et une grande partie de leur économie est liée à la fabrication du vin.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Ein Weinberg oder ein Weinanbaugebiet ist ein Areal das dem Weinanbau gewidmet ist. Meist wurden dazu sonnige Hanglagen genutzt. Die ältesten Weinanbaugebiete, die man je fand lagen in Armenien und sind fast 6000 Jahre alt.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Realizzato dalla fermentazione dell'uva, il primo vino risale circa al 6000 a. C. e si diffuse rapirdamente attraverso il Medio Oriente e l'Egitto, diventando una delle bevande più popolari del mondo antico. Le qualità d'uva usate per la realizzazione del vino crescono in differenti zone del mondo; la maggior parte delle vigne si possono trovare sulle colline e nelle vallate di regioni dal clima temperato. L'industria del vino è andata perfezionandosi nel corso dei secoli: molte regioni europee, come le vallate del Reno e della Loira, sono rinomate per la produzione di ottimi vini, principale forma di economia della zona.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]El vino, una bebida preparada a partir de uvas fermentadas, se elaboró por vez primera ya en el 6000 a. C. Su consumo se extendió rápidamente por Oriente Medio y Egipto, y pronto se convirtió en una popular bebida en el mundo antiguo. Las uvas empleadas en la fabricación del vino crecen en muchas y muy distintas partes del mundo. La mayoría de las viñas están en colinas y valles de regiones templadas. La vinicultura se ha perfeccionado como industria a lo largo de varios siglos. Muchas regiones, como los valles del Rin y del Loira en Europa, son conocidas por sus grandes vinos y obtienen una parte significativa de sus ingresos de la vinicultura.

TEXT.English: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] soon evolved in all cities of the colonies, especially in the harbour areas. There the inhabitants of the cities but especially sailors from the trading ships found entertainment in form of alcohol, music and many other things.
TEXT.French: Une taverne est un lieu de restauration ou un débit de boissons, alcoolisées notamment. Au Moyen âge, le tavernier vend le vin au pichet ou au tonneau alors que le cabaretier le sert au comptoir ou sur l'étal, à même la chaussée. Sous l'Ancien Régime, le tavernier ne vend que du vin alors que le cabaretier sert vin et repas complets, ce dernier parvenant à attirer toutes les couches de société. Les traiteurs, spécialisés à l'origine dans les noces et les banquets, supplantent au XVIIIe siècle tavernier, rôtisseur et cabaretier lorsqu'ils se mettent aussi à préparer les repas pour des clients fidèles ou de passage.
TEXT.German: [TAB]In den Hafenstädten der Neuen Welt entstanden sehr schnell unzählige [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT], in denen die Bewohner der Städte und vorallem auch die Seeleute der vielen Handelsschiffe Unterhaltung in Form von Alkohol, Musik und vielem mehr fanden. In manchen dieser Tavernen, vorallem in den berüchtigten Hafengegenden, ging es sehr rau her und sie waren Anziehungspunkt für Gesindel und zwielichtige Gestalten aller Art.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] soon evolved in all cities of the colonies, especially in the harbour areas. There the inhabitants of the cities but especially sailors from the trading ships found entertainment in form of alcohol, music and many other things.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] soon evolved in all cities of the colonies, especially in the harbour areas. There the inhabitants of the cities but especially sailors from the trading ships found entertainment in form of alcohol, music and many other things.

TEXT.English: [TAB]Leather has been one of the most important goods in human history. Usually procuced from Hides of Cattle it is mostly used for production of clothes.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le cuir est de la peau animale tannée (généralement de la peau de grands mammifères tels le boeuf et le porc), c'est-à-dire une substance morte, imputrescible, souple et insoluble dans l'eau. Le cuir est le fruit de la transformation des peaux opérée par les tanneries et les mégisseries.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Leder war in der menschlichen Geschichte eines der wichtigsten Materialien. Meist aus Rinderhäuten hergestellt diente Leder verschiedensten Zwecken, meist jedoch der Herstellung von Kleidung. Ledergerber war zwar einer der am weningsten angesehenen Berufe oder Stände, aber essentiell für jede damalige Gesellschaft. Auch in der neuen Welt spielte die Herstellung von Leder eine bedeutende Rolle.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Leather has been one of the most important goods in human history. Usually procuced from Hides of Cattle it is mostly used for production of clothes.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]Leather has been one of the most important goods in human history. Usually procuced from Hides of Cattle it is mostly used for production of clothes.

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful gold vein, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Prospector[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Prospectors are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] from a gold-producing tile!
TEXT.French: Pour exploiter au mieux une importante veine d'or, engagez un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert prospecteur[COLOR_REVERT]. Les experts prospecteurs sont capables d'extraire deux fois plus d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Or[COLOR_REVERT] que la normale !
TEXT.German: Um eine Goldader optimal zu nutzen, sollten Sie einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Schürfer[COLOR_REVERT] daran arbeiten lassen. Erfahrene Goldminenarbeiter können doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] von einem Gold produzierenden Geländefeld fördern!
TEXT.Italian: Per sfruttare al massimo una ricca vena d'oro, chiama un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]minatore d'oro esperto[COLOR_REVERT]. I minatori d'oro esperti sono in grado di raddoppiare la quantità di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oro[COLOR_REVERT] ottenuta dalla casella!
TEXT.Spanish: Para sacar el mejor partido de una vena de oro, llamad a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minero de oro experto[COLOR_REVERT]. Los Mineros de oro expertos son capaces de extraer el doble de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oro[COLOR_REVERT] de una casilla en la que haya este metal.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold Miners[COLOR_REVERT] do one thing only: make profit. [LINK=YIELD_GOLD]Gold[\LINK], which can only be mined on tiles with the [LINK=BONUS_GOLD]Gold Deposits[\LINK] bonus and which cannot be processed into anything else, can immediately be sold at a high price. Assigning an [LINK=UNIT_PROSPECTOR]Expert Prospector[\LINK] to this job will yield an increased amount of the shiny stuff!
TEXT.French: Les mineurs d'or ne font qu'une chose : réaliser des profits. L'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]or[COLOR_REVERT], qui ne peut être transformé en quoi que ce soit d'autre, peut être immédiatement vendu au prix fort. En assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert prospecteur[COLOR_REVERT] à cette profession, vous augmenterez votre production ce précieux métal !
TEXT.German: Goldminenarbeiter tun nur eins: Sie erhöhen Ihren Profit. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] kann nicht weiterverarbeitet werden, erzielt aber beim Verkauf einen hohen Preis. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Schürfer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, erhalten Sie sogar noch mehr von dem glänzenden Zeug!
TEXT.Italian: I minatori d'oro producono solo una cosa: ricchezza. L'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]oro[COLOR_REVERT], che non può essere trasformato in altro, può essere immediatamente rivenduto a caro prezzo. Assegnando un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]minatore d'oro esperto[COLOR_REVERT] a questa professione otterrai una maggiore quantità di questo brillante minerale!
TEXT.Spanish: Los Mineros de oro solo sirven para una cosa: generar beneficios. Como la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]oro[COLOR_REVERT] no puede convertirse en algo más, se puede vender de inmediato a un buen precio. Asignar a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minero de oro experto[COLOR_REVERT] a este puesto generará un montón del preciado metal.

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful gold vein, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Prospector[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Prospectors are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] from a gold-producing tile!
TEXT.French: Pour exploiter au mieux une importante veine d'or, engagez un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert prospecteur[COLOR_REVERT]. Les experts prospecteurs sont capables d'extraire deux fois plus d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Or[COLOR_REVERT] que la normale !
TEXT.German: Um ein Edelsteinvorkommen optimal zu nutzen, sollten Sie einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Schürfer[COLOR_REVERT] daran arbeiten lassen. Erfahrene Schürfer können doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Edelstein[COLOR_REVERT] von einem Geländefeld fördern!
TEXT.Italian: Per sfruttare al massimo una ricca vena d'oro, chiama un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]minatore d'oro esperto[COLOR_REVERT]. I minatori d'oro esperti sono in grado di raddoppiare la quantità di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oro[COLOR_REVERT] ottenuta dalla casella!
TEXT.Spanish: Para sacar el mejor partido de una vena de oro, llamad a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minero de oro experto[COLOR_REVERT]. Los Mineros de oro expertos son capaces de extraer el doble de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oro[COLOR_REVERT] de una casilla en la que haya este metal.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gemstone Miners[COLOR_REVERT] do one thing only: make profit. [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK], which can only be mined on tiles with the [LINK=BONUS_GEMS]Gemstone Deposits[\LINK] bonus and which cannot be processed into anything else, can immediately be sold at a high price. Assigning an [LINK=UNIT_PROSPECTOR]Expert Prospector[\LINK] to this job will yield an increased amount of the shiny stuff!
TEXT.French: Les mineurs de diamant ne font qu'une chose : réaliser des profits. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]pierres précieuses[COLOR_REVERT], qui ne peuvent être transformés en quoi que ce soit d'autre, peuvent être immédiatement vendues au prix fort. En assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert prospecteur[COLOR_REVERT] à cette profession, vous augmenterez votre production !
TEXT.German: Edelsteinschürfer tun nur eins: Sie erhöhen Ihren Profit. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Edelstein[COLOR_REVERT] kann nicht weiterverarbeitet werden, erzielt aber beim Verkauf einen hohen Preis. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Schürfer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, erhalten Sie sogar noch mehr von dem glänzenden Zeug!
TEXT.Italian: I minatori d'oro producono solo una cosa: ricchezza. L'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]oro[COLOR_REVERT], che non può essere trasformato in altro, può essere immediatamente rivenduto a caro prezzo. Assegnando un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]minatore d'oro esperto[COLOR_REVERT] a questa professione otterrai una maggiore quantità di questo brillante minerale!
TEXT.Spanish: Los Mineros de oro solo sirven para una cosa: generar beneficios. Como la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]oro[COLOR_REVERT] no puede convertirse en algo más, se puede vender de inmediato a un buen precio. Asignar a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minero de oro experto[COLOR_REVERT] a este puesto generará un montón del preciado metal.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearl Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK]. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS_2]Pearls[\LINK] will make them a Pearl Hunter. If an [LINK=UNIT_PEARLS_HUNTER]Expert Pearl Hunter[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Les chasseurs de perles sillonnent les mers à la recherche de perles de valeur. Dans l'écran de ville, placer un colon sur une case de mer où se trouvent des perles l'assigneront automatiquement à la profession de chasseur de perles. Si un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert chasseur de perles[COLOR_REVERT] est affecté à cette profession, il produira un montant nettement plus élevé de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]perles[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Perlensucher suchen entlang der Küste nach Perlen. Wird ein Kolonist der Arbeit auf einem Feld mit Perlen zugewiesen, wird er dadurch automaisch ein Perlensucher. Nutzen Sie wenn möglich den Erfahrene Perlensucher.
TEXT.Italian: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Expert Pearl Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT], which are valuable [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK]. Assigning an Expert Pearl Hunter to work a sea tile with the [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS_2]Pearls[\LINK] resource as a [LINK=PROFESSION_PEARLS_HUNTER]Pearl Hunter[\LINK] will provide 3 more Gems each turn than a regular colonist would.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Pearl Hunters can both be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK] and be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Experts chasseurs de perles[COLOR_REVERT] sont les maîtres des fonds marins. Tout océan ou côte travaillé augmente significativement en production de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]perles[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Perlensucher[COLOR_REVERT] sind Meister der Küste und des Ozeans. Sie können dort beträchtliche Mengen an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Perlen[COLOR_REVERT] gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Units working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE]Storage House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can take up the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cocoa Drier[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Cocoa Driers produce [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Cocoa[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Cocoa Pods[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Master Drier[\LINK] to this job will generate twice as much Cocoa, as long as enough Cocoa Pods are in stock.
TEXT.French: Les prairies peuvent toutes produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si le colon qui les exploite est assigné à la profession de Planteur de Café. Vos récoltes de Café peuvent être considérablement augmentées en assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur de Café professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] à cette fonction.
TEXT.German: Kakaotrockner trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kakaofrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] zu Kakaobohnen. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kako- u. Kaffeehändler:Kako- u. Kaffeehändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Le praterie possono ospitare piantagioni di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT], se assegno il lavoro di coltivatore di Caffè ai coloni che lavorano in quelle caselle. Puoi aumentare ulteriormente la produzione di Caffè assegnando lo stesso lavoro a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di Caffè [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las casillas de pradera pueden dar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si asignáis al Colono que trabaja ahí la profesión de Plantador de Café. La cosecha aumentará sustancialmente si ponéis a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de Café experto[COLOR_REVERT] en el puesto.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Coffee Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to filling your [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE_EXPANSION]Warehouses[\LINK] with [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK]. Any Coffee-producing tile they work as [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_PLANTER]Coffee Planters[\LINK] will have its Coffee production doubled![PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Coffee Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteurs de Café professionnels[COLOR_REVERT] doublent la production de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] dans la case où ils travaillent.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Kaffeepflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrücht[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatori esperti di Caffè[COLOR_REVERT] Raddoppiano infatti la quantità di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT] prodotta dalla casella in cui lavorano.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantadores de Café expertos[COLOR_REVERT] produce el doble de cantidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] en cualquier casilla en la que trabaje.

TEXT.English: [LINK=TERRAIN_SAVANNAH]Savannah[\LINK] tiles can yield [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK] if the colonist working them is assigned to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Your harvests of Coffee Berries can be significantly increased by assigning an [LINK=UNIT_COFFEE_PLANTER]Expert Coffee Planter[\LINK] to the job.
TEXT.French: Les prairies peuvent toutes produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si le colon qui les exploite est assigné à la profession de Planteur de Café. Vos récoltes de Café peuvent être considérablement augmentées en assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur de Café professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] à cette fonction.
TEXT.German: Savanne-Geländefelder können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Kaffeepflanzerberuf zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Kaffeeernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Kaffeepflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Le praterie possono ospitare piantagioni di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT], se assegno il lavoro di coltivatore di Caffè ai coloni che lavorano in quelle caselle. Puoi aumentare ulteriormente la produzione di Caffè assegnando lo stesso lavoro a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di Caffè [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las casillas de pradera pueden dar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si asignáis al Colono que trabaja ahí la profesión de Plantador de Café. La cosecha aumentará sustancialmente si ponéis a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de Café experto[COLOR_REVERT] en el puesto.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Driers[COLOR_REVERT] are proficient in drying [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Cocoa Pods[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Cocoa[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Coffee[\LINK] out of them. When assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_COCOA_DRIER]Cocoa Drier[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_DRIER]Coffee Drier[\LINK] profession, they are capable of turning out double the amount of both resources in the same amount of time it would take a regular colonist to create it.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Driers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maîtres torrefacteurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]café torréfié ou cacao[COLOR_REVERT] depuis les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]grains de cafés ou fèves de cacao[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kako- u. Kaffeehändler:Kako- u. Kaffeehändler[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kakaorüchte[COLOR_REVERT] in getrockneten Kaffee bzw. Kakao, wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Units working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE]Storage House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can take up the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Drier[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Coffee Driers produce [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Coffee[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Master Drier[\LINK] to this job will generate twice as much Coffee, as long as enough Coffee Berries are in stock.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maîtres torrefacteurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]café torréfié[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]grains de cafés[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Kaffeetrockner trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] zu Rohkaffee. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kaffeetrockner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are much more effective in exercising the [LINK=PROFESSION_HUNTER]Hunter[\LINK] profession than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus Resources like [LINK=BONUS_BISON]Bisons[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_DEER]Deer[\LINK]. Hunters produce both [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Fur[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Hunters can both be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK] and be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experts chasseurs[COLOR_REVERT] sont beaucoup des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chasseurs[COLOR_REVERT] beaucoup plus efficaces que les autres colons. La profession de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chasseur[COLOR_REVERT] est pariculièrement profitable sur certains bonnus comme le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bison[COLOR_REVERT] ou le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cerf[COLOR_REVERT] et produit à la fois de la fourrure et de la nourriture.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind im Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] viel effektiver als andere Kolonisten. Dieser Beruf ist auf bestimmten Bonus-Ressourcen besonders profitabel, wie z.B. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Büffel[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hirschen[COLOR_REVERT] ausgeübt werden und erzeugt sowohl [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Felle[COLOR_REVERT], wie auch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.

TEXT.English: A unit working on a [LINK=TERRAIN_TUNDRA]Tundra[\LINK] or [LINK=TERRAIN_SNOW]Permafrost[\LINK] tile or a tile with [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST]Forest[\LINK], [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST_TUNDRA]Taiga[\LINK] or a Fur-producing Bonus Resource can take up the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Hunters produce both [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Furs[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] for your colony, though the amount of Food produced is significantly less than the amount of Fur produced. The masters of this craft are [LINK=UNIT_HUNTER]Expert Hunters[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about methods of Food-production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experts chasseurs[COLOR_REVERT] sont beaucoup des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chasseurs[COLOR_REVERT] beaucoup plus efficaces que les autres colons. La profession de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chasseur[COLOR_REVERT] est pariculièrement profitable sur certains bonnus comme le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bison[COLOR_REVERT] ou le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cerf[COLOR_REVERT] et produit à la fois de la fourrure et de la nourriture.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind im Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] viel effektiver als andere Kolonisten. Dieser Beruf ist auf bestimmten Bonus-Ressourcen besonders profitabel, wie z.B. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Büffel[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hirschen[COLOR_REVERT] ausgeübt werden und erzeugt sowohl [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Felle[COLOR_REVERT], wie auch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the Coast and the Sea. Any tile with the [LINK=BONUS_SEALS]Seals[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_WALRUSS]Walrusses[\LINK] Bonus they work as [LINK=PROFESSION_SEAL_HUNTER]Seal Hunter[\LINK] will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Fur[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Seal Hunters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]chasseurs de phoques aguerris[COLOR_REVERT] sont les maîtres des côtes. Ils peuvent exploiter les bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]phoques[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]morses[COLOR_REVERT] avec beaucoup plus d'efficacité pour produire de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]fourrure[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Seelöwenjäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind Meister der Küste und des Ozeans. Sie können auf den Bonusressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seelöwen[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walrösser[COLOR_REVERT] beträchtliche Mengen an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fellen[COLOR_REVERT] gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] and to acquire the valuable [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Furs[\LINK]. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus [LINK=BONUS_SEALS]Seals[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_WALRUSS]Walrusses[\LINK] will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [LINK=UNIT_SEALS_HUNTER]Expert Seal Hunter[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of Fur and Food.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about methods of Food-production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]chasseurs de phoques aguerris[COLOR_REVERT] sont les maîtres des côtes. Ils peuvent exploiter les bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]phoques[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]morses[COLOR_REVERT] avec beaucoup plus d'efficacité pour produire de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]fourrure[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Seelöwenjäger jagen entlang der Küste und auf dem ewigen Eis um ihre Mitbürger mit Nahrung zu versorgen und um wertvolle Felle zu erbeuten. Wird ein Kolonist der Arbeit auf einer Bonusressource Seelöwen zugewiesen, so wird er automatisch Seelüwenjäger. Wird dieser Beruf einem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Seelüwenjäger[COLOR_REVERT] zugewiesen, so verdoppelt sich der Ertrag an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fellen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experts planteurs de chanvre[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT] qu'un autre colon.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] anzubauen und große Mengen dieses Rohstoffs zu ernten. Die Produktion an Hanf eines Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are specialist in cultivating [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK], the Raw Material for [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK]. When employed as [LINK=PROFESSION_HEMP_PLANTER]Hemp Planters[\LINK], they produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Hemp Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experts planteurs de chanvre[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT] qu'un autre colon.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] anzubauen und große Mengen dieses Rohstoffs zu ernten. Die Produktion an Hanf eines Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_HEMP_PLANTER]Expert Hemp Planter[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experts planteurs de chanvre[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT] qu'un autre colon.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Hanf überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!

TEXT.English: If you need shiploads of [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] to build more Ships, then the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Roper[COLOR_REVERT] is your best friend. When employed as a [LINK=PROFESSION_ROPES_MAKER]Roper[\LINK], this specialist can create double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]in the same amount of time as an average colonist.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Ropers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maîtres cordeliers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cordes[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maîtres cordeliers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cordes[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. They can do this in buildings like the [LINK=BUILDING_LANDING_STAGE]Pier[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The most effective units for this craft are [LINK=UNIT_ROPES_MAKER]Master Ropers[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les cordeliers produisent de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]corde[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT]. Ils travaillent dans les docks et les ports.
TEXT.German: Seilmacher produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Hafengegend statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.

TEXT.English: If you need a lot of [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK] fast, the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmaker[COLOR_REVERT] can be of great help. In the [LINK=PROFESSION_SAILCLOTH_MAKER]Sailmaker[\LINK] profession, he is capable of creating double the amount of these resources as regular colonists would from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Sailmakers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maîtres voiliers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]voiles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Segeltuchmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Segeltuch[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maîtres voiliers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]voiles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Segeltuchmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Segeltuch[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. They can do this in buildings like the [LINK=BUILDING_DOCK]Dock[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The most effective units for this craft are [LINK=UNIT_SAILCLOTH_MAKER]Master Sailmakers[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les voiliers produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]voiles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]chanvre[COLOR_REVERT]. Ils travaillent dans les docks et les ports.
TEXT.German: Segeltuchmacher verarbeiten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Segeltuch[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Hafengegend statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Indigo Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are specialized in maintaining [LINK=BONUS_INDIGO]Indigo Shrubs[\LINK] and harvesting precious [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] from them. Assigning an Expert Indigo Planter to the [LINK=PROFESSION_INDIGO_PLANTER]Indigo Planter[\LINK] profession will double the amount of [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] you receive from that tile.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Indigo Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Il n'y a pas mieux qu'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur d'indigo professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] pour produire d'abondantes cultures d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Les Planteurs d'indigo professionnels doublent la production d'indigon dans la case qu'ils exploitent !
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Indigopflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] anzupflanzen. Die Indigoproduktion jedes Indigo produzierenden Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatori esperti di indicado[COLOR_REVERT] sono i migliori lavoratori disponibili, quando si tratta di ottenere grandi raccolti di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indicado[COLOR_REVERT]. Ogni casella produttrice di indicado in cui lavorano raddoppia la produzione!
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantadores de indigo expertos[COLOR_REVERT] son los mejores trabajadores disponibles cuando se trata de obtener una copiosa recolecta de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Cualquier casilla en la que trabajen y produzca indigo doblará su producción de éste.
