TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_INDIGO_PLANTER]Expert Indigo Planter[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim with Indigo!
TEXT.French: Quand vous assignez un citoyen à l'exploitation de plaines, vous pouvez décider de lui allouer la profession de Planteur d'indigo, ce qui fournira à votre colonie une große quantité d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. En assignant un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Planteur d'indigo professionnel[COLOR_REVERT] à cette fonction, vos magasins regorgeront d'or !
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten dem Indigopflanzerberuf zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Indigopflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Indigo überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: Quando mandi un cittadino a lavorare caselle di pianure, puoi decidere di fargli svolgere la professione di coltivatore di indicado, che procurerà alla tua colonia un ricco raccolto di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indicado[COLOR_REVERT]. Assegnando questa professione a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di indicado[COLOR_REVERT], riempirai i tuoi magazzini di oro !
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando asignéis a un ciudadano a trabajar en una casilla de llanura, podéis hacer que adopte la profesión de Plantador de indigo, que proporcionará a vuestra colonia una buena cantidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Al asignar a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de indigo experto[COLOR_REVERT] este cometido, vuestras reservas rebosarán de este preciado material.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] are very proficient in making valuable [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK], like the Colonial Flags that will soon fly over every one of your colonies. These specialists are capable of creating double the number of Coloured Cloth from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] in the same amount of time as a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Free Colonist[COLOR_REVERT] would, when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession.Coloured Cloth is the most valuable good in Europe other than [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_GOLD]Gold[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Dyers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres teinturiers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costumes teintés[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de tissu et d'indigo.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Stoffe und Indigo in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres teinturiers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costumes teintés[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de tissu et d'indigo.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Stoffe und Indigo in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings suitable for dyeing cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_DYERY]Dyery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maison du teinturier[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment de base pour teinter des vêtements. Les colons avec pour profession teinturier produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costumes teintés[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tissu[COLOR_REVERT] et d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres teinturiers[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Haus des Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] ist das niedrigeste Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings suitable for dyeing cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_LARGE_DYERY]Large Dyery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Teinturerie[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment intermédiaire pour teinter des vêtements. Les colons avec pour profession teinturier produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costumes teintés[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tissu[COLOR_REVERT] et d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres teinturiers[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Färberei[COLOR_REVERT] ist das mittlere Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Large Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings suitable for dying cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. In addition, the Large Dyery gives a 50% bonus to all Coloured Cloth production. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Teinturerie industrielle[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment le plus avancé pour teinter des vêtements. Les colons avec pour profession teinturier produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costumes teintés[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tissu[COLOR_REVERT] et d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres teinturiers[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]große Färberei[COLOR_REVERT] ist das höchste Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Large Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for dying cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Large Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for dying cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] dye [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] with [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] in the [LINK=BUILDING_DYERS_HOUSE]Dyer's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The master of this craft are [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK], who work twice as fast, as long as enough Indigo and Cloth are available.
TEXT.French: Les teinturiers teintent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tissu[COLOR_REVERT] pour produire des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]costumes teintés[COLOR_REVERT] en utilisant de l'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indigo[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Färber färben [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] mittels [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT], wodurch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] entstehen. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Stoffproduktion statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]biens de luxe[COLOR_REVERT] et d'autres biens sont vendus aux colons. Le montant dépend fortement du nombre de citoyens dans la ville et de leur statut social. Ils paieront directement en or. Un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marché[COLOR_REVERT] est nécessaire pour activer le marché domestique d'une ville.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter[COLOR_REVERT] aus Europa und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Markt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.

TEXT.English: [LINK=YIELD_LUXURY_GOODS]Luxury Goods[\LINK] and other goods can be sold to your colonists if a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Village Market[COLOR_REVERT] or one of its upgrades is present in a settlement. The amount that can be sold strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in money.The higher levels, [LINK=BUILDING_TOWN_MARKET]Town Market[\LINK] and [LINK=BUILDING_CENTRAL_CITY_MARKET]Regional Market[\LINK] increase the demand for goods in a city.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]biens de luxe[COLOR_REVERT] et d'autres biens sont vendus aux colons. Le montant dépend fortement du nombre de citoyens dans la ville et de leur statut social. Ils paieront directement en or. Un [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]marché[COLOR_REVERT] est nécessaire pour activer le marché domestique d'une ville. Les niveaux plus élevés, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]gallerie marchande[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]bourse coloniale[COLOR_REVERT] augmentent la demande de biens dans une ville.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter aus Europa[COLOR_REVERT] und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dorfmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen. Die Ausbaustufen, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Städtischer Markt[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Überregionaler Kolonialmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen die Nachfrage.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Canons[COLOR_REVERT] sont nécessaires pour construire des bateaux et des artilleries. Ils peuvent être produits dans vos colonies via les batiments dédiés ou achetés en Europe.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonen[COLOR_REVERT] werden zum Bau von Schiffen oder Artillery an Land benötigt. Mit den entsprechenden Gebäuden können Kanonen selbst produziert oder auch in Europa gekauft werden.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_CANNONS]Cannons[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_TOOLS]Tools[\LINK] in the [LINK=BUILDING_ARMORY]Armory[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. Cannons are necessary to build ships and artillery units. The [LINK=UNIT_GUNSMITH]Master Gunsmith[\LINK] is the most effective unit when working as a Cannonsmith.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_GUNS]Guns, Cannons and Blades[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]canonniers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent des canons. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Canons[COLOR_REVERT] sont nécessaires pour construire des bateaux et des artilleries.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonenschmiede[COLOR_REVERT] stellen Kanonen her. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonen[COLOR_REVERT] werden zum Bau von Schiffen oder Artillery an Land benötigt.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce Cannons. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce Cannons. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units.

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful [LINK=YIELD_STONE]Stone[\LINK] [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_QUARRY]Quarry[\LINK], bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutters are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Stonecutters can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Pour exploiter au mieux une carrière de pierres, faites la travailler par un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert tailleur[COLOR_REVERT]. Les experts tailleurs puisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]pierres[COLOR_REVERT] que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Nutzen Sie wenn möglich [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Steinbergarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT], da diese die doppelte Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stein[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugen.
TEXT.Italian: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!
TEXT.Spanish: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a Peak tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_STONE]Stone[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_STONECUTTER]Expert Stonecutter[\LINK] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!
TEXT.French: En assignant un citoyen à travailler sur une colline ou une montagne, vous pouvez choisir le profession de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tailleur de pierres[COLOR_REVERT]. Celle-ci permet de produire de la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]pierre[COLOR_REVERT]. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]experts tailleurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de pierres que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Beim Zuweisen eines Arbeiters zu einem Feld, welches Steinabbau erlaubt, kann dem Arbeiter der Beruf Steinbergarbeiter zugewiesen werden.
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Stonecutter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Stonecutter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] is produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]laine[COLOR_REVERT] est produite à partir d'une boucherie travaillant le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mouton[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] is produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] is produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] is produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a hills tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shepherd[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_RANCHER]Expert Rancher[\LINK] to this profession, your stables will teem with Sheep! Note, however, that you can only breed Sheep if some Sheep are already present in a colony.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Livestock Breeding, see [LINK=CONCEPT_CATTLE_OR_SHEEP_BREEDING]Breeding Horses, Cattle or Sheep[\LINK]
TEXT.French: En assignant un citoyen à travailler sur une colline ou une montagne, vous pouvez choisir le profession de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]berger[COLOR_REVERT]. Celle-ci permet de produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]mouton[COLOR_REVERT]. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maîtres éleveurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de moutons que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Hügel-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafhirte[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafe[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Schafen überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a hills tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shepherd[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Sheep!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a hills tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shepherd[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Sheep!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] are produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]peaux[COLOR_REVERT] sont produites à partir d'une boucherie travaillant le [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]bétail[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] are produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] are produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] are produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cowboy[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_RANCHER]Expert Rancher[\LINK] to this profession, your stables will teem with Cattle! Note, however, that you can only breed Cattle if some Cattle are already present in a colony.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Livestock Breeding, see [LINK=CONCEPT_CATTLE_OR_SHEEP_BREEDING]Breeding Horses, Cattle or Sheep[\LINK]
TEXT.French: En assignant un citoyen à travailler sur un terrain, vous pouvez choisir le profession d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]éleveur[COLOR_REVERT]. Celle-ci permet de produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bétail[COLOR_REVERT]. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maîtres éleveurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de bétail que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhirte[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinder[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Rindern überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cowboy[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Cattle!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cowboy[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Cattle!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] are very gifted on the areas of precision, patience and tolerance for awful smells that is required of anyone practicing the [LINK=PROFESSION_LEATHER_MAKER]Leather Maker[\LINK] profession. They are capable of producing double the amount of [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] a regular colonist would create in the same period of time.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Tanners can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres tanneurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cuir[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]peaux[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Ledergerber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäute[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederwaren[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres tanneurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cuir[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]peaux[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Ledermacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Rinderhäute in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederwaren[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade to a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERY]Tannery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maison du tanneur[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment de base pour tanner du cuir. Les colons avec pour profession tanneur produisent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cuir[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]peaux[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres tanneurs[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerberhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe der Gebäudekette zum Gerben von Leder. Siedler im Beruf des Gerbers produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederware[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäuten[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] in greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tanner's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade to a [LINK=BUILDING_LEATHER_FACTORY]Leather Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannerie[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment intermédiaire pour tanner du cuir. Les colons avec pour profession tanneur produisent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cuir[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]peaux[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres tanneurs[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerberei[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Ausbaustufe der Gebäudekette zum Gerben von Leder. Siedler im Beruf des Gerbers produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederware[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäuten[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] in greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tannery[\LINK], and the Leather factory provides a 50% production bonus of Leather on top of that. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannerie industrielle[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment le plus avancé tanner du cuir. Les colons avec pour profession tanneur produisent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]cuir[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]peaux[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres tanneurs[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederfabrik[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Ausbaustufe der Gebäudekette zum Gerben von Leder. Siedler im Beruf des Gerbers produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederware[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäuten[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession Tanner produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Cloth[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres tisserands[COLOR_REVERT] producisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]draps de laine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meisterweber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Wolle in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wollstoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Cloth[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Cloth[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: By assigning a Colonist to work in a weaver's building, they can adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Weaver[COLOR_REVERT] profession, turning any available [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] into [LINK=YIELD_WOOL_CLOTH]Wool Cloth[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_WEAVER]Master Weaver[\LINK] to the job with greatly increase the amount of Wool Cloth yielded. Just make sure you have the extra Wool for your weaver to use!
TEXT.French: Les tisserands fabriquent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]draps de laine[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]laine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Weber scheidern [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wollkleidung[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wolle[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden in Gebäuden für Wollkleidungsproduktion statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Weber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Wool Weavers make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woolclothes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Wool Weavers make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woolclothes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Expert Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.French: Pour produire davantage de sel, utiliser un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert mineur de sel[COLOR_REVERT]. Les experts mineurs de sel produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT] que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Um ein Salzvorkommen optimal zu nutzen, sollten Sie einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Salzminenarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT] darauf arbeiten lassen. Erfahrene Salzminenarbeiter können doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] von einem Salzvorkommen fördern, wie andere Siedler!
TEXT.Italian: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.Spanish: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.

TEXT.English: By putting a colonist to work on a [LINK=TERRAIN_DESERT]Desert[\LINK] tile, you can assign him to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt Miner[COLOR_REVERT] profession, to provide your settlement with a useful bounty of [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK]. Assigning an [LINK=UNIT_MINER]Expert Miner[\LINK] to this job will yield an increased amount of Rock Salt.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT] peut être transformé en [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sel alimentaire[COLOR_REVERT]. Utilisez un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]expert mineur[COLOR_REVERT] pour produire deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] kann zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] weiterverarbeitet werden. Dieses erzielt beim Verkauf einen hohen Preis, sowohl in Europa, wie auch auf dem Binnenmarkt der Kolonien. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Minenarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, erhalten Sie sogar noch mehr von diesem durchaus lohnenden Gut!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tiles can produce [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] if a Colonist is working as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper Planter[COLOR_REVERT] on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is an [LINK=UNIT_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Expert Red Pepper Planter[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les collines sur les plaines et savanes peuvent produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] si un colon y exerce la profession de planteur de piment. La production est doublée avec un specialiste.
TEXT.German: Hügelfelder in der Prairie können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roten Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Pfefferpflanzerberuf zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Pfefferernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Pfefferpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.
TEXT.Spanish: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.

TEXT.English: If you want to get your [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spice Trade[\LINK] booming, hire an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Red Pepper Planter[COLOR_REVERT] first. Expert Red Pepper Planters gather twice as much [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] from the plot on which they work when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Red Pepper Planter[\LINK] profession as a normal colonist would.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Red Pepper Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]experts planteurs de piment[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Pfefferpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] delicately sort out the [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] that is brought into your colony's stores to make valuable [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] out of it. When assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession, they are capable of turning out double the amount of both resources in the same amount of time it would take a regular colonist to create it.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Spice Traders can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maître épicier[COLOR_REVERT] produit deux fois plus d'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]épices[COLOR_REVERT] ou de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sel alimentaire[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] ou de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviel Roten Pfeffer in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] bzw. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADER_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT], and dry [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Trader[\LINK] to this profession even doubles the output of Spices, as long as enough Red Pepper is available.
TEXT.French: Les épiciers sèchent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] pour le transformer en [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]épices[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Gewürzhändler trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roten Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzen[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_POST]Spice Trading Post[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maison de l'épicier[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment de base pour sécher des épices ou affiner du sel. Les colons avec pour profession épicier produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]épices[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] et du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sel alimentaire[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres épîciers[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhändlerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] in much greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HALL]Spice Trader's Hall[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Epicerie[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment intermédiaire pour sécher des épices ou affiner du sel. Les colons avec pour profession épicier produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]épices[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] et du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sel alimentaire[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres épîciers[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhandelsposten[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] in much greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_POST]Spice Trading Post[\LINK], and the Spice Trader's Hall grants a 50% production bonus of both Spices and Salt on top of that. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Halle aux épices[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment le plus avancé pour sécher des épices ou affiner du sel. Les colons avec pour profession épicier produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]épices[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]piment[COLOR_REVERT] et du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sel alimentaire[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sel brut[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres épîciers[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhandelshalle[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: No [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_VINEYARD]Vineyard[\LINK] is truly complete without an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grape Picker[COLOR_REVERT] inside to pick the best [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] available. If he is assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_GRAPES_PICKER]Grape Picker[\LINK] profession, any Grapes-producing tile worked by him will yield an increased amount of [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Grape Pickers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres vendangeurs[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT] que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Weintraubensammler[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grapes Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grapes Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] are creators of the finest wines the New World can offer. They produce twice as much [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] as a regular colonist when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Vintagers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres vignerons[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vin[COLOR_REVERT] à partir du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Winemakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Winemakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] tiles can produce [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] if a colonist in the profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grape Picker[COLOR_REVERT] is working on it. This output will be greatly increased if an [LINK=UNIT_GRAPES_PICKER]Expert Grape Picker[\LINK] is employed for this job.
TEXT.French: Les collines sur les prairies peuvent produire du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT] si un colon y exerce la profession de vendangeur.
TEXT.German: Hügelfelder auf Grasland können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Weintraubensammler zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Weintraubenernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Weintraubensammler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Hills on Grasland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grapescollector is working on it.
TEXT.Spanish: Hills on Grasland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grapescollector is working on it.

TEXT.English: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WINE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades become [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT], who press [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] to Juice, which then is fermented and turned into [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK]. The colonists who excel at this craft are [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les vignerons fabrique du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vin[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Winzer pressen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] zu Traubensaft, aus dem dann [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT] entsteht. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Winemakers press [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] to Juice, which then is made to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Winemakers press [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] to Juice, which then is made to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level building that is available for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_WINERY]Winery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maison du vigneron[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment de base pour distiller du vin. Les colons avec pour profession vigneron produisent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vin[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres vignerons[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winzerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigest Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]. In einem Winzerhaus wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] in much greater quantities than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_VINTAGERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_WINE_FACTORY]Wine Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chai à vin[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment intermédiaire pour distiller du vin. Les colons avec pour profession vigneron produisent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vin[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres vignerons[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winzerei[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]. In einer Winzerei wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] in much greater quantities than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_WINERY]Winery[\LINK]. Additionally, your settlement gets a 50% production bonus for Wine. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]Le [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Domaine viticole[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment le plus avancé pour distiller du vin. Les colons avec pour profession vigneron produisent du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]vin[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]raisin[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres vignerons[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weinfabrik[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]. In einer Weinfabrik wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is theh ighest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Cabinetmakers[COLOR_REVERT] are the ultimate artisans when it comes to designing Furniture, Cabinets and ornate Coffee Grinders. Assigning them to the [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] profession in your settlement will cause them to churn out [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] twice as fast as other colonists, as long as enough [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] is available.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Cabinetmakers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]maîtres ébénistes[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]meubles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bois précieux[COLOR_REVERT] que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT]erzeugen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbel[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Edelholz[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinetmaker's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the most basic building available for the production of [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK]. Colonists with the profession [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURY]Cabinetmaker's Shop[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]La [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maison de l'ébéniste[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment de base pour fabriquer des meubles. Les colons avec pour profession ébéniste produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]meubles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bois précieux[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres ébénistes[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelmacherhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigest Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbeln[COLOR_REVERT]. In einem Möbemacherhaus werden aus Edelholz teure Möbel hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Möbelschreiner zuweist. Meister [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinet Makers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use Master [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinet Makers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use Master [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinetmaker's Shop[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK]. Colonists with the profession [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] faster than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Furniture Maker's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURE_FACTORY]Furniture Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ebenisterie[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment intermédiaire pour fabriquer des meubles. Les colons avec pour profession ébéniste produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]meubles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bois précieux[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres ébénistes[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelschreinerei[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbeln[COLOR_REVERT]. In einer Möbelschreinerei werden aus Edelholz teure Möbel hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Möbelschreiner zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furnitury[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furnitury[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK]. Colonists with the profession [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] faster than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Furniture Maker's Shop[\LINK], and your colony gets a 50% production bonus in Furniture on top of that. Use [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]L'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Usine de meubles[COLOR_REVERT] est le bâtiment le plus avancé pour fabriquer des meubles. Les colons avec pour profession ébéniste produisent des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]meubles[COLOR_REVERT] à partir de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]bois précieux[COLOR_REVERT]. Assignez des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]maîtres ébénistes[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter votre production.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelfabrik[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbeln[COLOR_REVERT]. In eine Möbelfabrike werden aus Edelholz teure Möbel hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, the [LINK=BUILDING_SALOON]Saloon[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_THEATRE]Theatre[\LINK] and the National Wonder of the [LINK=BUILDING_OPERA]Grand Opera[\LINK] further increase that effect.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Les [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernes[COLOR_REVERT] vous apportent des profits en vendant de l'alcool et du divertissement à vos colons. Plus le niveau de culture de votre ville est élevé, plus elles sont efficaces. Les bâtiments plus avancés : [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Théâtre[COLOR_REVERT] puis [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opéra[COLOR_REVERT] augmente cet effet.
TEXT.German: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT] erwirtschaften einen Profit durch den Verkauf von Alkohol. Je höher die Kulturrate der Stadt, desto effektiver sind sie. Die Ausbaustufen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Koloniales Opernhaus[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den Gewinn durch Kultur.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.French: En assignant un citoyen à travailler sur une plaine ou une prairie, vous pouvez choisir le profession de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]fermier d'orge[COLOR_REVERT]. Celle-ci permet de produire de l'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]orge[COLOR_REVERT]. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]experts fermiers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus d'orge que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen- oder Grasland-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerstebauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Bauern[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] or [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_FARMER]Expert Farmer[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Barley!
TEXT.French: En assignant un citoyen à travailler sur une plaine ou une prairie, vous pouvez choisir le profession de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]fermier d'orge[COLOR_REVERT]. Celle-ci permet de produire de l'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]orge[COLOR_REVERT]. Les [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]experts fermiers[COLOR_REVERT] produisent deux fois plus d'orge que les autres colons.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen- oder Grasland-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerstebauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Bauern[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] überquellen!

By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
